title: T206 for sale: Uncle sam wants his $$ :(
author: lharri3600

posts.post_title: T206 for sale: Uncle sam wants his $$ :(
posts.post_content:
I'VE RECEIVED AND ACCEPTED A VERY GENEROUS OFFER FOR THE ENTIRE SET. THANK ALL OF YOU FOR YOUR OFFERS. I DO HAVE EXTRAS AND WILL ATTEMPT TO SELL THEM HERE OR ON EBAY. AGAIN, THANKS!! LISTED BELOW ARE THE CARDS FOR SALE. 


I'm selling off my t206 collection take look at psa registry #19 noah hudson's t206 collection. I'd love to sell them all in one lot. All reasonable offers will be looked at. Looks like i can post only 5 scans, others are available, just click on my avatar and view the album.
